name: Sofa bed
description: Mr S is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). He is a stroke patient and relies on his daugther for his daily needs. THKMC is looking for a sofa bed to improve his home condition. If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Qhairah Qhaliesah (Case Manager) at 9177 6614 or Qhairahqhaliesah@thkmc.org.sg Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

name: Wheelchair/ Pushchair
description:
Mr. N is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). He lives in a HDB rental flat and has been suffering from Parkinsons disease. After Mr N’s recent hospitalization, his condition deteriorated and is now fully dependent on his new FDW helper for all his activities of daily living. Mr N’s current wheelchair has worn out and he needs a replacement for the FDW helper to bring him out to the community. 
  
THKMC is looking for new/used wheelchair/pushchair to replace Mr. N’s wornout wheelchair. Due to Mr N's Parkinsons condition, his feet needs to rest on a bar rather than 2 pedal rests.
   
If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Case Worker Anthony at 96546542. We would appreciate it if the donor could deliver the item to the client’s home directly at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Ave 4.
    
Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.    
   
THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low- or no-income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.
